verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and Timothy <S%G5095><s%> our brother, <S%G80><s%> to the church <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is at <S%G1722><s%> Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in all <S%G3650><s%> Achaia: <S%G882><s%>
Grace <S%G5485><s%> be to you and peace <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father, <S%G3962><s%> and from the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be God, <S%G2316><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of mercies, <S%G3628><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of all <S%G3650><s%> comfort; <S%G3874><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> comforts <S%G3870><s%> us in all <S%G3650><s%> our tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> that we may be able <S%G1410><s%> to comfort <S%G3870><s%> them which are in any <S%G3956><s%> trouble, <S%G2347><s%> by the comfort <S%G3874><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> we ourselves are comforted <S%G3870><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For as the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> abound <S%G4052><s%> in us, so <S%G3779><s%> our consolation <S%G3874><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> abounds <S%G4052><s%> by Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And whether <S%G1535><s%> we be afflicted, <S%G2346><s%> it is for your <S%G5216><s%> consolation <S%G3874><s%> and salvation, <S%G4991><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is effectual <S%G1754><s%> in the enduring <S%G5281><s%> of the same <S%G846><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> we also <S%G2532><s%> suffer: <S%G3958><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> we be comforted, <S%G3870><s%> it is for your <S%G5216><s%> consolation <S%G3874><s%> and salvation. <S%G4991><s%>

And our hope <S%G1680><s%> of you is steadfast, <S%G949><s%> knowing, <S%G1492><s%> that as you are partakers <S%G2844><s%> of the sufferings, <S%G3804><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall you be also <S%G2532><s%> of the consolation. <S%G3874><s%>

For we would <S%G2309><s%> not, brothers, <S%G80><s%> have you ignorant <S%G50><s%> of our trouble <S%G2347><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> to us in Asia, <S%G773><s%> that we were pressed <S%G916><s%> out of measure, <S%G5236><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> strength, <S%G1411><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that we despaired <S%G1820><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of life: <S%G2198><s%>

But we had <S%G2192><s%> the sentence <S%G610><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> in ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> that we should not trust <S%G3982><s%> in ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> but in God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> raises <S%G1453><s%> the dead: <S%G3498><s%>

Who delivered <S%G4506><s%> us from so <S%G5082><s%> great <S%G5082><s%> a death, <S%G2288><s%> and does deliver: <S%G4506><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> we trust <S%G1679><s%> that he will yet <S%G2089><s%> deliver <S%G4506><s%> us;

You also <S%G2532><s%> helping <S%G4943><s%> together <S%G4943><s%> by prayer <S%G1162><s%> for us, that for the gift <S%G5486><s%> bestowed on us by the means of many <S%G4183><s%> persons <S%G4383><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> may be given by many <S%G4183><s%> on <S%G5228><s%> our behalf. <S%G5228><s%>

For our rejoicing <S%G2746><s%> is this, <S%G3778><s%> the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of our conscience, <S%G4893><s%> that in simplicity <S%G572><s%> and godly <S%G2316><s%> sincerity, <S%G1505><s%> not with fleshly <S%G4559><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> but by the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> we have had our conversation <S%G390><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%> and more <S%G4056><s%> abundantly <S%G4056><s%> to you-ward <S%G4314><s%> <S%G5209><s%>.

For we write <S%G1125><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> things to you, than <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you read <S%G314><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> acknowledge; <S%G1921><s%> and I trust <S%G1679><s%> you shall acknowledge <S%G1921><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to the end; <S%G5056><s%>

As also <S%G2532><s%> you have acknowledged <S%G1922><s%> us in part, <S%G3313><s%> that we are your <S%G5216><s%> rejoicing, <S%G2745><s%> even <S%G2509><s%> as you also <S%G2532><s%> are our's <S%G2257><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And in this <S%G5026><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> I was minded <S%G1014><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you before, <S%G4386><s%> that you might have <S%G2192><s%> a second <S%G1208><s%> benefit; <S%G5485><s%>

And to pass <S%G1330><s%> by you into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> and to come <S%G2064><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> out of Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> to you, and of you to be brought <S%G4311><s%> on my way <S%G4311><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> Judaea. <S%G2449><s%>

When I therefore <S%G3767><s%> was thus <S%G5124><s%> minded, <S%G1011><s%> did I use <S%G5530><s%> lightness? <S%G1644><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the things that I purpose, <S%G1011><s%> do I purpose <S%G1011><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> that with me there should be yes <S%G3483><s%> yes, <S%G3483><s%> and no <S%G3756><s%> no? <S%G3756><s%>
But as God <S%G2316><s%> is true, <S%G4103><s%> our word <S%G3056><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> you was not yes <S%G3483><s%> and no. <S%G3756><s%>

For the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> was preached <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you by us, even by me and Silvanus <S%G4610><s%> and Timotheus, <S%G5095><s%> was not yes <S%G3483><s%> and no, <S%G3756><s%> but in him was yes. <S%G3483><s%>
For all <S%G3745><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in him are yes, <S%G3483><s%> and in him Amen, <S%G281><s%> to the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> by us.
Now <S%G1161><s%> he which establishes <S%G950><s%> us with you in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and has anointed <S%G5548><s%> us, is God; <S%G2316><s%>
Who <S%G3588><s%> has also <S%G2532><s%> sealed <S%G4972><s%> us, and given <S%G1325><s%> the earnest <S%G728><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in our hearts. <S%G2588><s%>

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> I call <S%G1941><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for a record <S%G3144><s%> on my soul, <S%G5590><s%> that to spare <S%G5339><s%> you I came <S%G2064><s%> not as yet <S%G3765><s%> to Corinth. <S%G2882><s%>

Not for that we have dominion <S%G2961><s%> over your <S%G5216><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> but are helpers <S%G4904><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> joy: <S%G5479><s%> for by faith <S%G4102><s%> you stand. <S%G2476><s%>
